dss.description: Assisted Onsemi by web scraping articles that could help them identify their standing against other companies.
Currently helping the Madison Fire Department by creating a web application that would allow them to track their inventory.
Currently helping ClearView to create a database and web application to allow the organization of their work orders.

professional.name: Brigham Young University - Idaho Teaching Assistant

description.para: Helped approximately 700+ students learn concepts in the ITM 111 (Intro to Databases) and WDD 130 (Web Fundamentals) courses
Created a Concept Workshop that helped students prepare and succeed in their final exams
Substitute taught various topics such as database normalization, ERD creation, CRUD, CSS grid, HTML, JavaScript
Assisted in supporting the AWS system students use for their classes
Learned Spanish (Fluent). Had interactions with people through teaching and service
Discovered how to love the people, work hard, and live within a tight budget
Ascertained how to work with different personalities
Planned, raised funds, and assembled emergency backpacks for Sexton Mtn. Elementary School
This involved raising over $1,000 and coordinating twenty volunteers

projects.name: Holes Are Bad
projects.description: Collaborated with a team as configuration manager and acting team lead using C# to create a fully functional game that has a title and an end screen

projects.name: Head Counter App
projects.description: Created a mobile app to keep track of the number of students in the classes I TA for.
